CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Booking_FranceNB__c > Booking_GermanyNb__c, Booking_FranceNB__c > Booking_ItalyNb__c, Booking_FranceNB__c > Booking_SpainNb__c, Booking_FranceNB__c > Booking_AustriaNB__c ), 'BU France', IF( AND( Booking_AustriaNB__c > Booking_FranceNB__c, Booking_AustriaNB__c > Booking_ItalyNb__c, Booking_AustriaNB__c > Booking_SpainNb__c, Booking_AustriaNB__c > Booking_GermanyNb__c ), 'BU Austria', IF( AND( Booking_GermanyNb__c > Booking_FranceNB__c, Booking_GermanyNb__c > Booking_ItalyNb__c, Booking_GermanyNb__c > Booking_SpainNb__c, Booking_GermanyNb__c > Booking_AustriaNB__c ), 'BU Germany', IF( AND( Booking_ItalyNb__c > Booking_FranceNB__c, Booking_ItalyNb__c > Booking_GermanyNb__c, Booking_ItalyNb__c > Booking_SpainNb__c, Booking_ItalyNb__c > Booking_AustriaNB__c ), 'BU Italy', IF( AND( Booking_SpainNb__c > Booking_FranceNB__c, Booking_SpainNb__c > Booking_GermanyNb__c, Booking_SpainNb__c > Booking_ItalyNb__c, Booking_SpainNb__c > Booking_AustriaNB__c ), 'BU Spain', /*case they are all equals or 0 */ IF( E_club_country_code__c = 'FR', 'BU France', IF( E_club_country_code__c = 'AT', 'BU Austria', IF( E_club_country_code__c = 'DE', 'BU Germany', IF( E_club_country_code__c = 'IT', 'BU Italy', IF( E_club_country_code__c = 'ES', 'BU Spain', IF( /*case they souscription country is not filled with the proper value */ ISPICKVAL(PersonMailingCountryCode,'FR'), 'BU France', IF( ISPICKVAL(PersonMailingCountryCode,'AT'), 'BU Austria', IF( ISPICKVAL(PersonMailingCountryCode,'DE'), 'BU Germany', IF( ISPICKVAL(PersonMailingCountryCode,'IT'), 'BU Italy', IF( ISPICKVAL(PersonMailingCountryCode,'ES'), 'BU Spain', IF( /*case they address country is not filled with the proper value */ ISPICKVAL(Language__pc ,'FR'), 'BU France', IF( ISPICKVAL(Language__pc ,'AT'), 'BU Austria', IF( ISPICKVAL(Language__pc ,'DE'), 'BU Germany', IF( ISPICKVAL(Language__pc ,'IT'), 'BU Italy', IF( ISPICKVAL(Language__pc ,'ES'), 'BU Spain', 'BU France' ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: MarketingCountry
